items.sentence: Tom attempted to snuggle, but Mary pushed him away.
Tom boarded the ship along with his three children.
Tom seemed to enjoy himself yesterday at the party.
Tom seemed very surprised when I told him about it.
Tom seems to be having trouble getting things done.
Why don\'t you take off your coat and stay a while?
Why don\'t you tell me what you want for Christmas?
Would you be interested in going to Boston with us?
Would you like for me to make you something to eat?
Would you like me to go in and talk to Tom for you?
